entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow over northern sections. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
